inputs.topic_category_motivation: Sector-level theme linking policy to midstream equity and commodity flows.
inputs.motivation_for_relevance: Sector-level midstream energy is a niche industry vertical with no direct canonical asset mapping or dated catalyst; it does not provide a macro driver or tradable handle for trading decisions.

llm_topic_proposal_raw.motivation: The article identifies a policy-driven catalyst for US midstream operators, creating a new macro theme linking US energy policy to midstream equity and commodity flows.
llm_topic_proposal_raw.name: US Midstream Sector
